name: skate
chn: vi. & vt. (通常指) 滑冰, 溜冰; n. (旱) 冰鞋
example_en: She loves to skate on the frozen lake every winter.
example_cn: 她每年冬天都喜欢在结冰的湖面上滑冰。
word_family: skater (n. 滑冰者), skating (n. 滑冰运动), ice-skate (n. 冰鞋), roller-skate (n. 旱冰鞋)
memory_tips: 词源：来自荷兰语 'schaats'，意为冰鞋。联想记忆：想象在冰上滑行的感觉，'skate' 的发音类似于 'skeet'，可以联想到射击飞盘，但这里是在冰上滑行。图像记忆：想象一双冰鞋在冰面上划出优美的弧线。

image_prompt.main_image: A pair of ice skates placed neatly on a frozen lake, with a serene winter landscape in the background, including snow-covered trees and a clear blue sky.
image_prompt.example_image: A young girl gracefully skating on a frozen lake, wearing a warm winter coat and a bright scarf, with a joyful expression on her face as she glides across the ice.

collocations: skate park (滑板公园); ice skate (溜冰); roller skate (轮滑)
